description:
==============================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE BASIC CONCEPTS OF EXCEL

===============================================================

At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of...

Excel Environment, Excel Worksheet, Working with Excel Functions, Excel Security & Sharing Features, Dynamic Formatting in Excel, Sorting and Filtering Data in Excel, Using conditional Aggregate Functions in Excel, Working with Reports & Charts, Presenting Data Using Charts in Excel.
title: Microsoft Excel - Fundamentals
